amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit funds in the bill from being made available to Auburn University for the Catfish Pathogen Genomic Project, Auburn, Alabama.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 8 printed in Part B of House Report 110-290 to prohibit use of funds for the Catfish Pathogen Genomic Project in Auburn, Alabama.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Flake amendment (A009) Failed by recorded vote: 74 - 357 (Roll no. 809).
